Richmond.Jerman House: The Jerman House is a historic house at 24 Hampton Hills Lane in Richmond, Virginia. It is a 1-1/2 story brick structure, with a side gable roof, and flanking 1-1/2 story wings extending to the sides at a setback. The brick is multi-tone red brick, and is laid in Flemish bond, with dark gray glazed bricks interspersed.
